name: Umbrian
description:
Umbrian is a third-person puzzle platformer. With the aid of your spells, you will clear puzzles in an attempt to traverse deep caves and reach the surface. Run, jump and cast spells through Aztec inspired caves as you clear obstacles, solve puzzles and immerse yourself without the stress of monsters chasing you.

A Second-year game developed by 10 Owls over a period of 8 months. A project by an enthusiastic team who hopes you find joy in our game.

Controls

Movement- WASD

Camera Control - Mouse

Jump - Space

Fireball - 1 [right click to use]

Blink - 2 [hold right click]

 Levitate - 3 [hold right click]

Special thanks to Mr. Brick for creating various tracks for the game (which also feature in the trailer) and our Playtesters.
